actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit a State or local government employee to take compensatory time off in lieu of compensation for overtime hours, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit State or local government employers to grant their employees, upon employee request, compensatory time off in lieu of overtime compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit a State or local government employee to take compensatory time off in lieu of compensation for overtime hours, and for other purposes.
